methodref.name: FlattenSelectors
methodref.description: Output Cr-lf delimited list of selectors (commas -> crlf() + remove whitespace ).

methodref.name: FromString
methodref.description: Convert CSS text to an style definition.

methodref.name: FromStringSCss
methodref.description: Convert SCSS style sheet text to an style definition (handles scss variables etc).

methodref.name: OutputProcess
methodref.description: Process the CSS output (i.e. filter + output combination).

methodref.name: ToString
methodref.description: Output the CSS text that represents the style definition.

methodref.name: NewInstance
methodref.description: Create a new object instance of the same type.

page.original:
CSS::Media Class Properties Property Type Description leading_comments C Comments before css selector C media selector css StyleSheet CSS Stylesheet for media originalSelector C Full media selector
Methods Method Description PUBLIC FlattenSelectors AS c ()Output Cr-lf delimited list of selectors (commas -> crlf() + remove whitespace ). PUBLIC FromString AS v (text AS C)Convert CSS text to an style definition. PUBLIC NewInstance AS P ()Create a new object instance of the same type. PUBLIC OutputProcess AS v (output AS P)Process the CSS output (i.e. filter + output combination). PUBLIC ToString AS c (format] AS [C)Output the CSS text that represents the style definition.
See Also CSS Namespace
